dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Hmm... So I need to excise everyone in sight, right?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: It's hard to tell if it's day or night outside. Other than times when excision is needed... I always stay here.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: I see... So it's daytime right now? That brings back memories. I used to lazily drink this at this time of the day.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Ah, I was aware that it's nighttime. The staff working the night shift paid a visit just now.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: Outside of situations where we're needed... We Class 3 Excision staff members have to make sure our bodies are suitable for the type and concentration of the HP ampule to be administered.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Regeneration ampules are such a convenient invention... Like this, they can be used to keep us healthy and fix any wound~ And the concentration can be changed to induce decay in our foes.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: Ah... I don't like fighting against machines. The blade on my weapon only reacts to organic tissues, so it doesn't work that well on steel~

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
Are you wondering how I ended up in this job? Haah~ It feels like ages ago...
I think my grandmother sent me here, telling me to work here from now on. Well, what other reason could there be?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
Here's a secret... Truth is, one of the higher-ups here is acquainted with my family!
Huhu, is that what they call nepotism, I wonder?

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: You won't talk with me any longer? What a shame~

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Is it a... deployment order? You'll be calling me more often in the future? That's wonderful~ I've been terribly bored.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: I'm ready anytime.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Going in.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: I'm busy right now~ But I'll make time to hear what you say.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Excising now.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: That'll be hard to recover from.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Oh dear.

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Melted into a puddle, have you?

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Oh my... Have I... overdosed... on the ampule...?

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Huhu, it took no time at all.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Mm... It's not like this is what excision staff usually does, yes?

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Haah~ It was nice to breathe fresh air for the first time in a while.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Huhu, that was excellent if I say so myself. Can I have a little free time before we return?

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Oh dear... I suppose we should've called reinforcements.
